author: Kevin Gallagher

changelog.release_notes:
In the interest of reducing the battery usage, when the watchface is "broken mode" it will now automatically revert back to "fixed" after 2 minutes.
This is particularly helpful in cases where the "flick of the wrist" that triggered the switch to "broken mode" was unintentional (i.e. you are not even looking at the watch but it is busy redrawing the screen frequently and thus using the battery unnecessarily).

Initial release.
Analog face with accelerometer action!
Bluetooth connection indicator
Battery indicator
Charging indicator
Day of month display

description:
Broken! is a great watchface to show off your Pebble. Flick your wrist and the hands come loose and will spin in whatever direction you tilt your wrist. A random set of the hour markers come loose and will roll around your Pebble's face. Flick again and your watch returns to normal.
Features date, Bluetooth connection, battery and charging indicators.
Please heart if you like it!
